summary: Market systems development consultant with 10 years of experience in international cooperation and private sector development. I have 6 years of experience implementing the Market Systems Development (MSD) approach in fragile contexts. I have supported aid and private sector actors across sectors: agriculture, financial inclusion, renewable energies,  skills development, WASH, and humanitarian aid.
